meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7747.

td.p: Alyssa Abel, a bookseller from Waupaca, Wisconsin
Randy Mathews, a fragrance specialist from Houston, Texas
Kate Jovin, a social worker from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,799)

tr.td: TWIN PEEKS
WORLD LEADERS
STATE CONSUMABLES
MOVIE TITLES IN FOREIGN LANDS
ALL GOOD THINGS
MUST COME TO AN "N"
(Alex: "N"--the letter "N"--will be at the end of each correct response.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
